statements: UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET age = 25, name = 'Alice' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET gender = 'Female', image_data = '\x35463A2B' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET age = 30, name = 'Alice' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET name = 'Bob', age = 25, image_data = decode('FFD8FFE000104A46494600010101004800480000', 'hex') WHERE gender = 'Male'
UPDATE faces SET name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE face_logs SET event = 'Login' WHERE face_id = 456 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
UPDATE faces SET name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE face_logs SET event = 'Login' WHERE face_id = 2 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01'
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE identified_faces SET confidence = 0.95, person_name = 'John Doe' WHERE face_id = 5;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE identified_faces SET confidence = 0.95, person_name = 'John Doe' WHERE face_id = 100;
UPDATE face_images SET image_description = 'Updated description' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE face_features SET feature_vector = 'updated_vector' WHERE feature_id = 2
UPDATE face_images SET image_description = 'Updated description' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE face_recognition SET recognition_result = 'Match' WHERE confidence > 0.8;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET person_name = 'Alice', capture_timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE known_faces SET known_face_encoding = '{0.1,0.2,0.3}', added_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE person_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET person_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE known_faces SET known_face_encoding = ARRAY[0.5, 0.6, 0.7] WHERE person_name = 'Alice' OR person_name = 'Bob';
